label.phrase: if the kids remain illiterate in portuguese the language will unlikely be their tool of expression or thought

clusterList.phrase: if the kids remain illiterate in portuguese the language will unlikely be their tool of expression or thought
they have lost portuguese skills and barely understand abstract concepts in the language
it's hard for them to express nuances in their feelings in portuguese
portuguese will help them learn about their ancestors and develop their identities as brazilians
these kids should focus on portuguese acquisition first and improve their intellectual capacities in the language to avoid falling behind in both
the only problem is many of them do not speak english
